summary: The test suite validates the image generation capabilities of the Litellm library across various AI providers. It includes a shared base class with common fixtures and utilities, unit tests for the Bedrock workflow covering model support, request/response handling, and cost computation, and integration-style tests that exercise the public image generation API with default parameters for Azure OpenAI, OpenAI, Amazon Bedrock Stable Diffusion, and Google Vertex AI, checking optional arguments and response structures.
business_intent: Guarantee that the library correctly interfaces with multiple image generation services, providing accurate request formatting, response parsing, and pricing calculations, thereby delivering reliable AI image generation features to end‑users.
